name: Celestial Viking Invasion
description:
Celestial Viking Invasion

Fight of waves of infected vikings while building up your base defenses. How many waves can you survive?

A backwater savage planet has been engulfed in a toxic meteor shower thats spreading parasitical deseases to the local inhabitant, swaying them to its will. Its your task to fight off these infected savages and hold position for as long as you can.

A game made in 4 days for the January Wake Up Jam with the (loose) them of christmas.

Credits:

Tech: Jamie Linell, Taionee Rhodes

Design: Louis Whitehouse, Daniel Brooks

Art: Synthy Studios Polygon Packs
